gurmukhi: ਨ ਸੰਕ ਰਾਜ ਧਾਰੀਅੈ ॥ ਨ ਬੋਲ ਬੋਲ ਹਾਰੀਅੈ ॥੨੦੬॥
transliteration: Na Sank Raaj Ddareeai|| Na Bol Bol Dareeai||206||
translation: “Adandon the position of duality from your mind and do not fail in your promise.”206.

gurmukhi: ਨ ਲਾਜੀਅੈ ॥ ਨ ਭਾਜੀਅੈ ॥ ਰਘੁੲੇਸ ਕੋ ॥ ਬਨੇਸ ਕੋ ॥੨੦੭॥
transliteration: Na Laajeeai|| Na Bhaajeeai|| Raghues Ko|| Banes Ko||207||
translation: “O king ! Do not hesitate and run away from your promise, give exile to Ram.207.

gurmukhi: ਬਿਦਾ ਕਰੋ ॥ ਧਰਾ ਹਰੋ ॥ ਨ ਭਾਜੀਅੈ ॥ ਬਿਰਾਜੀਅੈ ॥੨੦੮॥
translation: “Bid farewell to Ram and take back the proposed rule from him. Don’t run away from your promise and be seated peacefully.208.

gurmukhi: ਬਸਿਸਟ ਕੋ ॥ ਦਿਜਿਸਟ ਕੋ ॥ ਬੁਲਾੲੀਅੈ ॥ ਪਠਾੲੀਅੈ ॥੨੦੯॥
transliteration: Basist Ko|| Dijist Ko|| Bulaaeeai|| Pathaaeeai||209||
translation: “O king ! Cal Vasishtha and the royal priest and send Ram to the forest.”209.

gurmukhi: ਨਰੇਸ ਜੀ ॥ ੳੁਸੇਸ ਲੀ ॥ ਘੁਮੇ ਘਿਰੇ ॥ ਧਰਾ ਗਿਰੇ ॥੨੧੦॥
transliteration: Dares Jee|| Ouses Lee|| Ghoume Ghire|| Dharaa Gire||210||
translation: The king heaved a long sigh, moved hither and thither and then fell down.210.

gurmukhi: ਸੁਚੇਤ ਭੇ ॥ ਅਚੇਤ ਤੇ ॥ ੳੁਸਾਸ ਲੈ ॥ ੳੁਦਾਸ ਹ੍ਵੈ ॥੨੧੧॥
transliteration: Souchet Bhe|| Achet Te|| Ousaas Lai|| Udaas Hvai||211||
translation: The king again came to his senses from the stupor and grievously heaved a long breath.211.
With tears in his eyes and anguish in his utterance,
The kin said to Kaikeyi, “You are a mean and evil woman.212.
“You are a blemish on womankind and a store of vices.
“You have no shame in your eyes and your words are ignominious.213.
“You are evil woman and are the destroyer of enhancement.
“You are performer of evil deeds and shameless in your Dharma.214.
